text: The 2015 African Women's Youth Handball Championship was the 4th edition of the tournament, organized by the African Handball Confederation, under the auspices of the International Handball Federation and held in Nairobi, Kenya from July 2 to 9, 2015. Egypt won their first title. The top three teams qualified for the 2016 world championship. ==Participating teams== {| class="wikitable" !width=175px|Teams |- | |} ==All matches== aLL teams played in a double round robin system.
